actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution relative to the expenses incurred by the committee appointed to arrange for, and attend, the funeral of the Honorable James B. Allen, late a Senator from the State of Alabama.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Senate to pay from the contingent fund of the Senate the actual and necessary expenses incurred by the committee to arrange for and attend the funeral of the Honorable James B. Allen, the late Senator from the State of Alabama.

titles.title: A resolution relative to the expenses incurred by the committee appointed to arrange for, and attend, the funeral of the Honorable James B. Allen, late a Senator from the State of Alabama.
